author: Not available

text.0: æala, on hu grimmum      and hu grundleasum
text.10: fremdre worulde.      Him is frofre ðearf.
text.2: þonne hit þa strongan      stormas beatað
text.5: and mid uua forgit      þone ecan gefean,
text.6: ðringð on þa ðiostro      ðisse worulde,
text.7: sorgum geswenced.      Swa is þissum nu
text.8: mode gelumpen,      nu hit mare ne wat

source: The Complete Corpus of Anglo-Saxon Poetry
